title: CoLD Fusion: A Real-time Capable Spline-based Fusion Algorithm for Collective Lane Detection
summary: Comprehensive environment perception is essential for autonomous vehicles to operate safely. It is crucial to detect both dynamic road users and static objects like traffic signs or lanes as these are required for safe motion planning. However, in many circumstances a complete perception of other objects or lanes is not achievable due to limited sensor ranges, occlusions, and curves.
